ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Played a little last night.
ygData.msgSnippet: nothing works the same with Harmonic.  charming doesn t clear damage list, save resistances don t work against dragons.  it s a whole different world. JUST
ygData.messageBody:
nothing works the same with Harmonic. charming doesn't clear damage list,
save resistances don't work against dragons. it's a whole different world.

JUST KIDDING! ALL CAPS! ;)

dunno Harm, i have been doing it for my wife's cleric the last month to
great effect.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L46 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> I am extremely efficient at twinking exp for people. I noticed
> I couldn't do it last night. But I'll check again. I ran three
> tests, so it hard to be a coincidence three times.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
